project.name: |-- 005-lambdas-with-existing-interfaces
project.description:
Keywords: + Behavior Parameterization + Predicates + Lambdas, lambda expressions
This project includes a very simple example demonstrating how to use lambdas with existing Java interfaces like Comparator and Runnable.
PredicatesRunner: Demonstrates how to use lambda expressions to with Comparator and Runnable interfaces.
